Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs and expectations. Given its exceptional quality and functionality, it's valued at $10,000 by many. I am extending this opportunity to you at a special introductory price of $9,500. This is an exclusive offer tailored to appreciate your interest and commitment to excellence. Don't miss out on this chance to own a product that promises to deliver unparalleled value and satisfaction. Please let me know if you have any questions or if you're ready to proceed with the purchase. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $9,500. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $9,500
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $10,000
